title: Delinea Privilege Manager - Local Security Events
description:
The Delinea Privilege Manager Local Security Events dashboard provides detailed insights into the following types of events:

-   **Password Disclosure Events** : Password Disclosure Events contain any type of password disclosure activity.
-   **Newly Discovered File Events** : Newly Discovered File Events contain information about newly discovered files on the system.
-   **Change History Events** : Change History Events contain information about any changes made in Delinea Privilege Manager.

definition.content:
**Dashboard Overview**

The Delinea Privilege Manager Local Security Events dashboard provides detailed insights into the following types of events:
- **Password Disclosure Events** : Password Disclosure Events contain any type of password disclosure activity.
- **Newly Discovered File Events** : Newly Discovered File Events contain information about newly discovered files on the system.
- **Change History Events** : Change History Events contain information about any changes made in Delinea Privilege Manager.

For more information, see the [Delinea Privilege Manager integration documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/delinea_privilege_manager/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
